View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 3:52 PM
Hey Kachwano, I hope you're having a lovely time during the holiday season.

We've created a group for equatorial project leaders to share their projects and successes so that we can all do our best to reach the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.

I wanted to send you some information via LinkedIn - would you mind?

I'd really value your feedback and support in making this group active and productive.

Maybe you could join the group and help us reverse the negative effects of climate change... here's the info:

https://www.linkedin.com/groups/12747681/
Our Equator
Our Equator
90 members
FEB 27
NEW
Kachwano Alex sent the following messages at 11:10 AM
View Kachwano’s profileKachwano Alex
Kachwano Alex 11:10 AM
Thanks

Jo Peninsulas 11:30 AM
You're welcome, Kachwano! I'm glad you found the information helpful. We truly appreciate your interest and support in working towards the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.

Please don't hesitate to join the group and share your thoughts, experiences, and any projects you're involved in. We're looking forward to your active participation and collaboration with other like-minded professionals in the group.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to reach out. Together, we can make a difference!

Best regards,
Jo

Zach, EarthDay 2023 is scheduled to be the biggest environmental event in history. With Fortune 50s, hundreds of SMBs, and industry leading tree planting groups already joining forces, we’re making history and we’d like you to be a part of it. Would love to connect
Zach Harris, CSP sent the following messages at 6:49 AM
View Zach’s profileZach Harris, CSP
Zach Harris, CSP (He/Him) 6:49 AM
Good Evening Jo! How can I help?

Jo Peninsulas 7:05 AM
Hi Zach, thank you for your quick response! We're thrilled to have you on board for Earth Day 2023. There are several ways you can contribute and make a positive impact:

1. Join our Global Community for Earth Day by clicking the link below. This will connect you with like-minded individuals and organizations working towards a greener future:
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/BxKUH5UI8xkGlcuhSCpBI3>
2. Share your expertise and ideas with the community. Your knowledge and experience in sustainability can inspire and guide others.
3. Promote Earth Day 2023 within your professional network and encourage others to join and participate.
4. If your company or organization is interested in partnering with us, please let us know. We're always looking for more collaborators to help amplify our impact.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need more information. We're excited to have you on board and look forward to working together for a greener, more sustainable future.

Best regards,
Jo

The meeting would be with me, Jo Peninsulas, and potentially one of our Earth Day 2023 project coordinators, depending on the specific topics you'd like to discuss. We're here to provide information about our initiatives and explore potential collaboration opportunities with you and BranchPattern.

To schedule a meeting, please use the following link to find a suitable time slot that works best for you: <https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub>

Looking forward to connecting and discussing Earth Day 2023 with you!

Best regards,
Jo

Hi Jo. Whats the topic ? are you reaching out for a speaker ? Steffen

Jo Peninsulas 5:25 PM
Hi Steffen,

Thanks for your response! Earth Day 2023 is focused on raising awareness about environmental issues and promoting sustainable practices. We are indeed looking for speakers, thought leaders, and collaborators who can contribute their expertise and insights to make this event a success.

If you're interested in being a speaker or discussing other ways you can be involved, I would be happy to schedule a call to explore potential collaboration opportunities.

Please use the following link to find a suitable time slot that works best for you: <https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub>

Looking forward to connecting with you!

Best regards,
Jo
